workshoptitle: Build a Data Lake with Autonomous Warehouse

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Introduction to Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Data Catalog.

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Setup the Workshop Environment
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the required and optional tasks to setup your workshop environment.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Load Data from Local Files
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the required and optional tasks to setup your workshop environment.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Load Data from Public Object Storage Buckets
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the loading data from public object storage buckets.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Load Data from Private Object Storage Buckets
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the loading data from public object storage buckets.

tutorials.title: Lab : Query Data Across Autonomous Database and the Data Lake
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to query data from ADB and Object Storage.

tutorials.title: Lab : Clean up Resources Used in the Workshop (Optional)
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to identify and delete the resources that you have created in this workshop.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
